price: 3. Akitiselaki yo(1) buku(2) na bosôló, ezali kondima na babuku ekitaka liboso. Mpe akitisi torah(3) mpe indjil.(4)
arabic: نَزَّلَ عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَأَنزَلَ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلَ
footnotes:
1 Muhammad (kimia mpe losambo ya Allah ezala likolo naye).
2 Kurani.
3 Torah: Ezali buku oyo Allah akitisaki ераї ya Mûssa.
4 Indjil: Ezali buku oyo Allah akitisaki ераї ya Issa.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: nazzala ʿalayka al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi muṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi wa-anzala al-tawrāta wal-injīla
